name: Platform Runner #3025 (TV wipeout edition) #Ue4JamSummer
description:
You were chosen as a participant in a yet another weird TV-show.

Run as fast as you can until the end, and earn nothing. Good Luck !

Warning: The game may cause frustration! Even I can't beat it on the first try.

Controls : 

AWSD - move

Space - jump

Mouse - look

R - Restart

Additional tnx to Juhani Junkala (SubspaceAudio) for the  music

https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action  (CC0)
